Key Match Events: India won by 6 wickets with 1 ball remaining.
Suryakumar Yadav was named Player of the Match for his unbeaten 26 off 31 balls.
Washington Sundar was Cricinfo's MVP with 51.23 points.
Arshdeep Singh took 2 wickets for 7 runs in 2 overs.
India chased down the target, scoring 101/4 in 19.5 overs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Bharat Ratna Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Cricket Stadium, Lucknow.
The series is level at 1-1 after this match.
